DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit00_ReadyToSwitchOn
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit01_SwitchedOn
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit02_OperationEnabled
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit03_MotorFailure
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit04_VoltageEnabled
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit05_QuickStop
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit06_SwitchOnDisabled
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit07_Warning
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit10_TargetReached
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord).

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.SWBit11_InternalLimitActive
DigitalIO.Description: Specific bit of the SW (StatausWord).

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit0_IsReferenced
DigitalIO.Description: Shows if the gripper is referenced.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit1_Moving
DigitalIO.Description: Shows if the gripper is moving.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit2_ProgramError
DigitalIO.Description: Indicates a program error.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit3_CurrentLimitation
DigitalIO.Description: Initcates if the current limitation is active

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit4_Toggle
DigitalIO.Description: Shows if the controller is running (alive bit)

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit5_SoftwareLimitNeg
DigitalIO.Description: Shows if the outer software limit is reached.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit7_ParameterAck
DigitalIO.Description: ParameterAck is used to acknowledge a handshake protokol to write parameters.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte1Bit6_SoftwareLimitPos
DigitalIO.Description: Shows if the inner software limit is reached.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte2_1_ParameterID
DigitalIO.Description: ExtendedDigitalInput Byte 2 Bit 0 to 3 - Used to show a parameter

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte2_2_MotionProfile
DigitalIO.Description: ExtendedDigitalInput Byte 2 Bit 4 to 7 - Used to show the active motion profile

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte3Bit0_STO_1
DigitalIO.Description: Shows the state of the STO 1.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDIByte3Bit1_STO_2
DigitalIO.Description: Shows the state of the STO 2.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDOByte1Bit4_ToggleBit
DigitalIO.Description: Extends the ControlWord with additional bits. Toggle bit is used as an alive signal.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDOByte1Bit7_ParameterStrobe
DigitalIO.Description: Extends the ControlWord with additional bits. Parameter strobe is used to trigger a handshake protokol to write parameters.

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDOByte2_MotionProfile
DigitalIO.Description: ExtendedDigitalOutput Byte 2 Bit 4 to 7 - Used to trigger motion profiles

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.EDOByte2_ParameterID
DigitalIO.Description: ExtendedDigitalOutput Byte 2 Bit 0 to 3 - Used to chose a parameter

DigitalIO.Name: ZimmerR840.HelpDI_IdValue
DigitalIO.Description: These two byte are used to transmit the actual value of a specific parameter or the error value of PE, MF or EC.
